DOC.detailed_description: A prospective , randomize control study determine efficacy liposomal bupivacaine give local injection wound sit patient undergo urologic surgery . Subjects prospective study randomly divide use electronic program two group : The first group receive intraoperative local Liposomal Bupivacaine injection port placement site . The control group receive local Marcaine ( bupivacaine HCl ) injection Primary Outcome Measures : - Total opioid consumption measure intravenous morphine equivalent dose postoperative hospital Stay - Postoperative pain assessment use visual Analog Pain Scores & Brief Pain Inventory form . - Length Hospital Stay - Time First Opioid Use . - Postoperative Constipation , paralytic ileus
DOC.criteria: Patients undergo urologic surgery . Pregnant and/or nursing mother . Allergy bupivacaine . History drug/alcohol abuse . Severe cardiovascular , hepatic , renal disease neurological impairment .
